Chapter 287: Ren Tianyou regain consciousness

Chapter 287: Ren Tianyou regain consciousness


In the middle of unknown abyss, a small brook flowed in a mountain gully.


But the surprising thing was, the color of this small brook however was bright-red as if the blood of a human.


And large amount of dark clouds enveloped the entire sky, basically couldn’t see the sun, which gave people a kind of very stifling feeling.


And at this moment, a shadow was drifting over towards this small brook from a distant place. Carefully looking, this shadow was nevertheless a human.


The clothing on the body of this person had already changed into a tatters, which basically couldn’t cover his body.


And on his body, there were terrifying wounds everywhere. These wounds were so terrifying that anyone would be stuck with terror and feel chill if they see these wounds.


And what no one was expecting was, this person with such thickly dotted wounds was unexpectedly a youngster.


Furthermore one could feel faint breathing on the tip of his nose, clearly showing he was still alive.


And at this moment, this small brook ejected a bloody spray, which happens to hit on the body of this youngster, sending him flying and heavily falling to a small empty place underneath the cliff.


Probably because the impact was too big, along with a few coughing, this youngster suddenly spat out a mouthful of blood. After that his complexion became even paler.


And at this moment, the eyelids of this youngster slowly moved few times, and finally opened slowly.


“Did I die?” After opening his eyes and looking at the unfamiliar surroundings all around him, Ren Tianyou thought inwardly.


Yes this person was Ren Tianyou who had mysteriously disappeared after the battle against Amike. No one would have thought that he would appear at this place.


“Cough, cough, so painful!” At this time, this movement of Ren Tianyou evoked the injury of his body, and a severe pain was immediately transmitted to his brain.


“I can feel the pain, this means I’m still alive.” Feeling pain all over his body, Ren Tianyou slowly thought while simultaneously recalling the scene after Amike had exploded.


At that time, after Amike had exploded, a huge explosion instantly swept everything around with him as a center.


And the five Rashomon which were in front of Ren Tianyou were basically unable to obstruct this explosion at all. They were directly destroyed instantly, turning into broken pieces.


Then that huge explosion instantly engulfed Ren Tianyou.


Although the defense power of his Full Body Susanoo was very strong, but Ren Tianyou had already spent majority of his strength as well as his eye power before.


And this caused him to seriously lack eye power, and coupled with the destroying heaven exterminating earth power of explosion of God Lord realm expert Amike, the Full Body Susanoo was directly split opened at the final moment by this explosion.


And at that final moment Ren Tianyou recalled his Shikotsumyaku ability, then he immediately used this ability to create a layer of bones around his body for protection. And after that he passed out. As for why he was here, and what was this place, Ren Tianyou didn’t know anything.


“Hiss……it’s really painful ah.” When he slightly moved his body, he immediately felt great pain, which made him grit his teeth to endure the pain.


He slowly moved his body, now with this kind of injured body, he didn’t dare to have too much movement. Finally after spending great effort, he finally got up and was able to lean his back against the ice-cold cliff while sitting on the ground.


“It seems I was really a little bit too arrogant and complacent, thinking with Kamui and Hiraishin no Jutsu, I can regard everyone in this word with disdain. It seems I really was too naïve.” After his Sharingan advanced to Eternal Mangekyo Sharingan, his eye power was further strengthen, and the kamui of his two eyes were also greatly strengthen, in addition after learning Hiraishin no Jutsu, a kind of arrogance and complacent feeling was born inside his heart, thinking he could achieve anything in this continent.


And right now Ren Tianyou couldn’t help but recall the words Uchiha Itachi had stated, “In this world, there is no invincible ninjutsu, as long as you seriously take it, you can find the ways to break it.”


“It seems that fellow Amike was alert against my Hiraishin no Jutsu, so at the final moment, he made his that space magical beast to use its last bit of power to seal off the space around.” Ren Tianyou recalled Bathing Flame Devouring Heaven Beast sealing the space around at the key moment, making him unable to use Hiraishin no Jutsu to escape, while slowly thinking.


“It appears hereafter I have to pay attention to the way of my thinking.” Ren Tianyou sighed, while looking at his body’s those terrifying wounds. After that making a wry smile, he thought, “This time, if it was not for the support of the powerful life-force of Forever Green, this time I’d really doomed.”


“Forget it, first I should recover from my injuries.” After thinking this, he sat cross-legged and used the sage chakra within his body to heal his injury.


Along with the circulation of chakra, a cyan colored six edged star appeared on the forehead of Ren Tianyou. This six edged star send out a powerful life force which surrounded the body of Ren Tianyou. Now powerful life force was in the process of unceasingly entering the body of Ren Tianyou.


………….


At Supreme Light Academy, White Tiger and his group of nine were currently standing on the top of a building far away while looking at the lively situation within the academy.


“This place is completely normal, there is no sigh of battle. Do you all really think someone is able to finish off Zero in one move?” Looking at the students underneath, White Tiger doubtfully said.


“But my magic was really indicating at this place, was it wrong?” Looking at the lively situation underneath, Azure Dragon doubtfully said.


“Perhaps Zero had really came to Supreme Light Academy.” At this moment, Jade Maiden suddenly said.


“How did you know Jade Maiden?” Hearing Jade Maiden, Vermilion Bird doubtfully asked.


“Don’t tell me you have already forgotten about that hidden place within this academy?”


“Hidden Place? Don’t tell me Tower of Babel?” Vermilion Bird immediately with some excitement.


“Yes, Tower of Babel, if Zero had really came to Supreme Light Academy, then he ought to have gone to Tower of Babel.” Jade Maiden said while nodding her head. And simultaneously recalled the words Ren Tianyou had once said, “The secrets of this Tower of Babel is not small, if I have time, then I will definitely came here again to have a look.”


“Then, let us immediately go to Tower of Babel.” Thinking Ren Tianyou might be within Tower of Babel, everyone instantly got excited, then disappeared from that roof.
